summary: "El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie" is a 2019 American crime thriller that follows Jesse Pinkman after the events of the TV series "Breaking Bad." Written and directed by Vince Gilligan, the film sees Aaron Paul reprise his role as Jesse, alongside several original cast members. Gilligan started planning the story while writing the series finale. Shot secretly in New Mexico, the film was released on Netflix and in theaters in 2019, receiving positive reviews and multiple award nominations. It won Best Movie Made for Television at the Critics' Choice Television Awards and Best Motion Picture Made for Television at the Satellite Awards.
title: El Camino A Breaking Bad Movie
